content.raw: This is a little trickier than you might think. For one thing ContactGeometry is not unique -- you can use the same piece of ContactGeometry repeatedly. Instead you want the ContactSurface which is a (geometry,material) pairing attached to a particular mobilized body. There was a [recent discussion about this on the Simbody forum](https://simtk.org/forums/viewtopic.php?f=47&t=5251). Tell me if that helps and if not I'll help you sort it out. (I wish Bitbucket would stop indenting, though!)
content.html: This is a little trickier than you might think. For one thing ContactGeometry is not unique -- you can use the same piece of ContactGeometry repeatedly. Instead you want the ContactSurface which is a (geometry,material) pairing attached to a particular mobilized body. There was a recent discussion about this on the Simbody forum. Tell me if that helps and if not I'll help you sort it out. (I wish Bitbucket would stop indenting, though!)
